title: Actor Alicia Witt Turns Musician With 'Revisionary History'
teaser: In lean years she played piano in the Beverly Wilshire Hotel. Otherwise she's acted in roles for Justified and Mr. Holland's Opus. NPR's Scott Simon speaks with Alicia Witt about her debut album.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
